eyeColors.name: Brown
eyeColors.description: The most common eye color, ranging from light to dark shades.

eyeColors.name: Blue
eyeColors.description: A color associated with clarity and calmness, ranging from light blue to deep navy.

eyeColors.name: Green
eyeColors.description: A color often associated with nature, ranging from light to dark shades.

eyeColors.name: Hazel
eyeColors.description: A multi-colored combination of brown, green, and sometimes blue.

eyeColors.name: Gray
eyeColors.description: A neutral color ranging from light silver to dark gray.

eyeColors.name: Amber
eyeColors.description: A warm, golden-brown color often seen as a variant of brown eyes.

eyeColors.name: Violet
eyeColors.description: A rare and striking purple or violet eye color.

eyeColors.name: Red
eyeColors.description: An uncommon and intense red eye color, sometimes associated with fantasy or supernatural elements.

eyeColors.name: Black
eyeColors.description: A very dark brown or black eye color, often appearing almost black.

eyeColors.name: Silver
eyeColors.description: A metallic silver or gray eye color, giving a unique and otherworldly appearance.
